import axios from "axios"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import Modal from "react-modal"; export default function PatientListCard(props) { const history = useHistory(); // const Temperature,TemperatureType,spO,bp,Pulse,Rbs,is_ins const [showVitalModal, setshowVitalModal] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { axios.defaults.headers.common[ "Authorization" ] = `Bearer ${localStorage.getItem("token")}`; }, []); const handleHistoryDirect = (_) => { history.push("/patientHistory"); }; const handleVitalSubmit = (_) => { const Params = { temperature: "50", temperature_type: 0, }; axios .post( `https://myplusdoctor.med2myhome.com/api/user/storevital?patient_id=${props.patient_id}`, Params ) .then((res) => { console.log(res.data); }); }; const handleStartConsult = (_) => { history.push("/consult", { patient_id: props.patient_id }); }; return ( <>
{props.first_name} {props.last_name}
{props.sex} | {props.blood_group}
{props.mobile_no}
Add Vitals
Temperature :
TemperatureType :
spO :
bp :
Pulse :
Rbs :
is_insulin :
insulin_quantity :
post_prandial :
fasting :
height :
weight :
 {/*
*/} ); }
